title: Reliquiæ Spelmannianæ the posthumous works of Sir Henry Spelman, Kt., relating to the laws and antiquities of England : publish'd from the original manuscripts : with the life of the author.
author: Spelman, Henry, Sir, 1564?-1641.
publisher: Printed at the Theater for Awnsham and John Churchill ...,
notes: Issued in 1723 as part 2 of The English works of Sir Henry Spelman, publish'd in his life-time.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Imperfect: port. and ill. lacking in filmed copy.
